info.name: Gmail 小清新版
info.description:
Mod From Gmail Easy Access Colored Buttons  

Url:http://userstyles.org/styles/56063/gmail-easy-access-colored-buttons
info.additionalInfo:
PS:modify from http://userstyles.org/styles/56063/gmail-easy-access-colored-buttons

2013.1.15  add gmail left ad,bottom ad...

style.css:
/*****************************************
 * Gmail Easy Access Colored Buttons
 * (c)reated by steve 2011 - 2012
 *
 * Author      : steve
 * Updated     : May 2nd, 2012
 * Version     : 4.4
 * Description : Modifies the colors of most used icons for Gmail
 * Usage       : Use with Stylish Firefox extension (http://userstyles.org/) or copy to your Firefox userContent.css file
 *****************************************/

@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); 
@-moz-document domain(mail.google.com) {

/* I haven't found better way to select this button: */
div[aria-label="Delete"], /* DELETE BG (BUTTON BODY) */
div[aria-label="Löschen"],
div[aria-label="Smazat"],
div[aria-label="Odstrániť"] {
    background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , rgba(255, 128, 128, 0.6), rgba(220, 128, 128, 0.6)) !important;
}


.ar6,              /* <- INBOX */
.ar8,              /* ARCHIVE */
.asl,              /* SPAM */
.ar9,              /* DELETE */
.ase,              /* MOVE TO */
.asb,              /* LABEL */
.asf,              /* RELOAD */
.adj,              /* < PREV */
.adk,              /* > NEXT */
.aos,              /* SETTINGS */
.hB,               /* <= Reply */
.mK,               /* <= Reply to all */
           /* Small icons */
.gx,               /* expand all */
.gq,               /* collapse all */
.g1,               /* PRINT */
.gZ, .eI,          /* New Window */
.o3.T-I-J3,        /* Group talk */
.ank, .aoc,        /* mail to group */
.anp, .anl,        /* calendar link */
.ana,              /* call phone */
.yE, .gW,          /* attachment icon */
.anh .ane,         /* CHAT */
.end-of-list {
    background-image: url("data:image/png;base64,") !important;
    background-attachment: scroll !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
    background-color: transparent !important;
}

/* offset positions */
.ar6 {   background-position: 0 -42px !important; }       /* <- INBOX */
.ar8 {   background-position: -84px -21px !important; }   /* ARCHIVE */
.asl {   background-position: -42px -42px !important; }   /* SPAM */
.ar9 {   background-position: -63px -42px !important; }   /* DELETE */
.ase {   background-position: -84px -42px !important; }   /* MOVE TO */
.asb {   background-position: -21px -42px !important; }   /* LABEL */
.asf {   background-position: -63px -21px !important; }   /* RELOAD */
.adj {   background-position: -21px -21px !important; }   /* < PREV */
.adk {   background-position: -42px -21px !important; }   /* > NEXT */
.aos {   background-position: 0 -21px !important; }       /* SETTINGS */
.hB {    background-position: 0 -63px !important; }       /* <= Reply */
.mK {    background-position: -21px -63px !important; }       /* <= Reply to all */
/* Small icons */
.gx {        background-position: 0 -84px !important; }      /* expand all */
.gq {        background-position: -21px -84px !important; }  /* collapse all */
.g1 {        background-position: -84px -63px !important; }  /* PRINT */
.gZ, .eI {   background-position: -63px -63px !important; }  /* New Window */
.o3.T-I-J3 { background-position: -21px 0px !important; }    /* Group talk */
.ank, .aoc { background-position: -63px -84px !important; }  /* mail to group */
.anp { background-position: -42px 0px !important; }          /* calendar link */
.anl { background-position: -42px -84px !important; }        /* more actions */
.ana {       background-position: -63px 0 !important; }      /* call phone */
.yE, .gW {   background-position: -2px 0 !important; }       /* attachment icon */
.anh .ane {  background-position: -84px 0px !important; }    /* CHAT */
td[class="Bu y3"],
div[class="nH PS"]{display:none !important;}
}
